An Act to provide for the winding up and dissolution of the
Prescribed Minerals and Materials Commission; to vest the
undertaking of the Prescribed Minerals and Materials
Commission in the Government; to repeal the Prescribed
Minerals and Materials Commission Act; and to provide for
matters connected with or incidental to the foregoing.
